channel.title: 3 on Harish Guda
channel.description: Recent content in 3 on Harish Guda

item.title: Seemingly-Beneficial Interventions
item.description: We analyze the key property of interventions that make them beneficial to one or all members in an interaction.

item.title: An Economic Analysis of Agricultural Support Prices in Developing Economies
item.description: We study the role of guaranteed support prices in agriculture under supply yield uncertainty and demand-side budget constraints.
